description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `url` in method `Spryker\Client\QuoteRequestsRestApi\Dependency\Client\QuoteRequestsRestApiToZedRequestClientBridge::call()`.
Bridges: Method createQuoteRequest() must have `public function create<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature.
Bridges: Method updateQuoteRequest() must have `public function update<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature.
